trans-unit.source: Added a cdl_convert.py stub file to the package root level, which will allow running of the cdl_convert script without installation. Due to relative imports in the python code, it was no longer possible to call cdl_convert/cdl_convert.py directly.
trans-unit.target: 在包的根目录下添加了一个 cdl_convert.py 存根文件,这将允许在不安装的情况下运行 cdl_convert 脚本。由于在 python 代码中的相对导入,不再能直接调用 cdl_convert/cdl_convert.py。

trans-unit.source: Added ability to parse CMX EDLs
trans-unit.target: 增加了解析CMX EDL的能力。

trans-unit.source: All parse functions now live under
trans-unit.target: 现在所有的解析函数都在

trans-unit.source: All write functions now live under
trans-unit.target: 现在所有的写功能都在

trans-unit.source: Before generating a pull request, make sure to run the test suite::
trans-unit.target: 在生成拉请求之前,请确保运行测试套件:。

trans-unit.source: Builds can be downloaded from the GitHub page or the PyPI repository entry.
trans-unit.target: 可以从GitHub页面或PyPI存储库条目下载构建。

trans-unit.source: Converts between common ASC Color Decision List (CDL) formats
trans-unit.target: 在常见的ASC颜色决定列表(CDL)格式之间进行转换。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug that was preventing
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个错误,它阻止了

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug where ALE’s with blank lines would not convert correctly.
trans-unit.target: 修复了带有空白行的ALE无法正确转换的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug where we weren’t reading line endings correctly in certain situations.
trans-unit.target: 修复了在某些情况下我们无法正确读取行尾的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a script bug where a collection format containing color decisions will not have those color decisions exported as individual color corrections.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个脚本错误,在这个错误中,包含颜色决定的集合格式不会将这些颜色决定作为单个颜色修正导出。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug where ALE’s without ‘Scan Filename’ fields could not parse correctly.
trans-unit.target: 修复了没有“扫描文件名”字段的ALE无法正确解析的错误。

trans-unit.source: For usage as a python module, see the module documentation.
trans-unit.target: 作为python模块使用,请参见模块文档。

trans-unit.source: Giving a ColorCorrection a non-duplicate ID now works unless the
trans-unit.target: 赋予ColorCorrection一个非重复的ID,现在可以工作了,除非

trans-unit.source: I either haven’t had time to build a parser for the format yet, or I might even be unaware it exists. Perhaps you should drop by the issues page and create a request for the format? If creating a request for a format it helps immensely to have a sample of that format.
trans-unit.target: 我或者还没有时间为该格式构建解析器，或者我什至不知道它的存在。也许您应该浏览问题页面并创建格式请求？如果创建格式请求，则可以极大地获取该格式的示例。

trans-unit.source: If the tests fail, note which tests are failing, how they would have been affected by your code. Always assume you broke something rather than that the tests are ‘wrong.’ If you know you didn’t break something, and the tests are simply reporting out of date results based on your changes, change the tests.
trans-unit.target: 如果测试失败，请记下哪些测试失败，它们将如何受到代码的影响。始终假设您破坏了某些东西，而不是测试是“错误的”。如果您知道自己没有破坏任何东西，而测试只是根据您的更改报告了过时的结果，请更改测试。

trans-unit.source: If you don’t want to bother with a pip style install, you can alternatively grab the entire cdl_convert directory, then set up a shortcut to call
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想打扰安装点子样式，则可以选择获取整个cdl_convert目录，然后设置一个快捷方式来调用

trans-unit.source: If you just want to convert to a
trans-unit.target: 如果你只是想转换到一个

trans-unit.source: If your code fails the tests (Travis-ci.org checks all pull requests when you create them) it will be rejected. If the code style doesn’t follow PEP-8, it’s not going to be a high priority for integration.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的代码未通过测试（Travis-ci.org在创建请求时检查所有拉取请求），它将被拒绝。如果代码风格不遵循PEP-8，那么集成就不会成为重中之重。

trans-unit.source: Installing is as simple as using pip::
trans-unit.target: 安装就像使用pip:一样简单。

trans-unit.source: No longer officially supporting Python 3.2, as I’ve had to remove it from our CI builds. It should still work just fine though, but we won’t be running CI against it.
trans-unit.target: 不再正式支持Python 3.2，因为我不得不从我们的CI版本中删除它。虽然它应该仍然可以正常工作，但是我们不会针对它运行CI。

trans-unit.source: Take a look at the issues page and if you see something that you think you can bang out, leave a comment saying you’re going to take it on. While many issues are already assigned to the principal authors, just because it’s assigned doesn’t mean any work has begun.
trans-unit.target: 查看问题页面，如果发现自己认为可以解决的问题，请发表评论说您将继续进行下去。尽管已经将许多问题分配给主要作者，但仅因为分配了问题并不意味着任何工作已经开始。

trans-unit.source: The issues page on GitHub is the best place to report bugs or request support, and while
trans-unit.target: GitHub上的问题页面是报告错误或请求支持的最佳位置，

trans-unit.source: The ASC has defined schemas for including the 10 basic numbers in 5 different formats:
trans-unit.target: ASC已经定义了包括5种不同格式的10个基本数字的模式。

trans-unit.source: The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
trans-unit.target: 上述版权声明和本许可声明应包含在软件的所有副本或主要部分中。

trans-unit.source: The biggest change in 0.7 is the addition of collection format support.
trans-unit.target: 0.7中最大的变化是增加了收藏格式的支持。

trans-unit.source: The script, when run directly from cdl_convert.py, will now write errors to stderror correctly, and exit with a status of 1.
trans-unit.target: 当直接从 cdl_convert.py 中运行该脚本时,现在会正确地将错误写入 stderror,并以状态为 1 退出。

trans-unit.source: These are complex formats, and seeing real world samples helps write tests that ensure correct parsing of real world EDLs and CDLs. If you don’t even see a format of CDL listed that you know exists, open an issue at the github issues page asking for parse/write support for the format, and include a sample.
trans-unit.target: 这些格式很复杂，看到真实的示例有助于编写测试，以确保正确解析真实的EDL和CDL。如果您甚至没有看到列出的已知CDL格式，请在github 问题页上打开一个问题， 要求对该格式进行解析/写入支持，并提供示例。

trans-unit.source: When submitting, you’ll be asked to waive copyright to your submitted code to the listed authors. This is so we can keep a tight handle on the code and change the license for future releases if needed.
trans-unit.target: 提交时，系统会要求您放弃所提交代码的版权给列出的作者。这样一来，我们就可以严格处理代码，并在需要时更改许可证以用于将来的发行版。

trans-unit.target: 现在可以接受一个原始字符串或一个

trans-unit.source: as a script, instead of a python package itself (indeed, even the name is formatted more like a script (with an underscore) than the more common all lowercase of python modules.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个脚本,而不是python包本身(事实上,连名字的格式都更像一个脚本(带下划线),而不是更常见的python模块的全小写。

trans-unit.target: 在尝试设置SOP或Sat Power之前,现在可以使用。

trans-unit.source: converts between common ASC CDL formats. The American Society of Cinematographers Color Decision List (ASC CDL, or CDL for short) is a schema to simplify the process of interchanging color data between various programs and facilities.
trans-unit.target: 在常见的ASC CDL格式之间转换。该电影摄影师的美国社会色彩确定表（ASC CDL，或CDL的简称）是简化各种程序和设备之间交换颜色数据的处理的模式。
文件现在返回一个集合。

trans-unit.source: flag is given. This means that incoming collections that contain duplicate IDs will not fail out.
trans-unit.target: 标志。这意味着包含重复ID的传入集合不会失败。

trans-unit.source: flag to script, which checks all parsed
trans-unit.target: 标志到脚本,它检查所有解析的

trans-unit.source: flag to the script, which allows user to specify the output directory converted files will be written to.
trans-unit.target: 标志,允许用户指定转换后的文件将被写入输出目录。

trans-unit.source: flag to the script, which goes through the entire conversion process but doesn’t actually write anything to disk. Useful for troubleshooting, especially when combined with
trans-unit.target: 标记到脚本，该脚本将经历整个转换过程，但实际上不会向磁盘写入任何内容。对于故障排除很有用，尤其是与

trans-unit.source: flag to the script, which halts on errors that can be resolved safely (such as negative slope or power values)
trans-unit.target: 标志,当出现可以安全解决的错误(如负斜率或功率值)时,脚本就会停止。

trans-unit.source: flag. When provided with an output collection format, each color correction in the input will be exported to it’s own collection.
trans-unit.target: 旗。当提供输出集合格式时，输入中的每个颜色校正将导出到其自己的集合。

trans-unit.source: for sane values, and prints warnings to shell
trans-unit.target: 的正常值,并向shell打印警告。

trans-unit.source: now lives under the main module
output, or provide multiple outputs with the

started as a simple script to convert from one format to another. As such, it wasn’t named with the standards that one would usually use for a python module. By the time the project became big enough, was on PyPI, etc, it was too spread out on the web, in too many places to make changing easy. In the end, I opted to keep it. At some point,
trans-unit.target: 作为一个简单的脚本开始，可以从一种格式转换为另一种格式。因此，它没有以通常用于python模块的标准命名。当项目变得足够大，在PyPI上等时，它已经在网络上散布开了，在太多的地方使更改变得容易。最后，我选择保留它。在某一点，

trans-unit.source: supports parsing ALE, FLEx, CC, CCC, CDL CMX EDL and RCDL. We can write out CC, CCC, CDL and RCDL.
trans-unit.target: 支持解析ALE、FLEx、CC、CCC、CDL CMX EDL和RCDL。我们可以写出CC、CCC、CDL和RCDL。

trans-unit.source: to convert ASC CDL information between these basic formats to further facilitate the ease of exchange of color data within the Film and TV industries.
trans-unit.target: 将ASC CDL信息在这些基本格式之间进行转换,以进一步促进电影和电视行业内色彩数据交换的便利性。

trans-unit.source: works in Python 2.6 through 3.4 and PyPy. A full test suite runs continuous integration through Travis-ci.org, coverage through coveralls.io, and code quality checked with landscape.io. Code is pep 8 compliant, with docstrings following google code docstring standards.
trans-unit.target: 在Python 2.6到3.4和PyPy中工作。一个完整的测试套件运行通过不断整合Travis-ci.org通过，覆盖 coveralls.io和代码质量检查landscape.io。代码符合 pep 8 规范，其文档字符串遵循Google代码文档字符串标准。
